flawed_nl_solution:
Since Johnson got $2500, each part is therefore $2500/5 = $<<2500/5=500>>500
Mike will get 2*$500 = $<<2*500=10000>>10000
After buying the shirt he will have $10000-$200 = $<<10000-200=9800>>9800 left
#### 9800

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 1000, not 10000. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
